item.description:
Ricardo's Ristorante ( http://www.opentable.com/riccardos) is a traditional Italian restaurant in North Square, just down the street from the Paul Revere House. It's large and airy. I've eaten there a couple of times recently and found the food to be very tasty. I especially liked the Ravioli Ripini con  Aragosta-Lobster filled ravioli topped with gulf shrimp in a creamy scampi sauce-delicious! The house specialty is veal scallopini. Appetizers run $9-15, pastas $17-24 and entrees $18-32. ( http://www.opentable.com/rest_profile_menu.aspx?rid=56740&tab=1)

Let's meet up for drinks at their spacious bar between 6:00-7:00. We'll sit down to dinner at about 7:00. Afterward, we'll visit a caffe for coffee and pastries. If you're coming from the Greenway, walk down the right side of Hanover Street, take your first right onto Richmond and walk a block down. You'll see Ricardo's across North Street. Please bring cash as we won't get separate checks.

So please join us for a Spring evening in Boston's North End.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'Pages' tab for further event guidelines.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at the bar from 6:00-7:00
item.name: Ricardo's Ristorante-Dinner
